thread.title: Brad Huddleston
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Brad Huddleston

author: Brad Huddleston
title: Brad Huddleston
text:
I know this phrase is old and possibly clich√© but it applies to Disc Makers:
They undersell and over deliver.
The quality of the work is obviously what we're all after, but the huge bonus is that Disc Makers' prices are outstanding and they deliver on time. In fact, I had a massive project that required extra work. Disc Makers walked me through the complexities with kindness and politeness and delivered ahead of schedule. As my title says, I keep coming back to Disc Makers.
